sentences.sContent: He had never done anything for them, whereas they had done everything for him.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had never done anything for them, whereas they had done everything for him.
sentences.sCn: 他从未为他们做过任何事，反之他们却为他做了所有事。

trans.tranOther: used at the beginning of an official document to mean ‘because of a particular fact’
